TEXT.TITLE: UNIVERSITY <UPT> REPORTS MARCH LENS SALE
TEXT.BODY: University Patents Inc said its optical products subsidiary sold 5,652 Alges soft bifocal contact lenses in March, after allowances for exchanges and returns. The lenses were approved for marketing in April 1986 by the Food and Drug Administration. Reuter
